fields.summary: Initial Setup for Git Repo and Environment
fields.description:
Set up the Git repository and development environment for the project.

Subtasks:
- Set up Git repository for version control.
- Configure `.gitignore` to exclude unnecessary files.
- Set up Python virtual environment.
- Install dependencies (Flask, PostgreSQL, SQLAlchemy).
- Set up Flask application structure with modular components.

fields.summary: Create Models and Schemas for Database Tables
fields.description:
Design and implement the database models and schemas for the application.

Subtasks:
- Create User model schema.
- Create Car model schema.
- Create Listing model schema.
- Create CarTransaction model schema.
- Create MakeModelYear model schema.
- Define relationships between models.
- Implement data validation and constraints.

fields.summary: Create CLI Controller for Database Management
fields.description:
Implement CLI commands to manage the database (create, drop, seed tables).

Subtasks:
- Implement CLI command to create tables.
- Implement CLI command to drop tables.
- Implement CLI command to seed tables.
- Handle exceptions and provide user feedback.

fields.summary: Produce JSON File for Seeding Data
fields.description:
Create JSON files for seeding data into the database for testing purposes.

Subtasks:
- Create JSON file for seeding User data.
- Create JSON file for seeding Car data.
- Create JSON file for seeding Listing data.
- Create JSON file for seeding CarTransaction data.
- Create JSON file for seeding MakeModelYear data.
- Validate data integrity and consistency.

Set up the basic route structure for all controllers in the application.

Subtasks:
- Create controller files for Auth, Car, Listing, CarTransaction, MakeModelYear.
- Define skeleton routes for Auth (e.g., `/register`, `/login`).
- Define skeleton routes for Car (e.g., `/cars`).
- Define skeleton routes for Listing (e.g., `/listings`).
- Define skeleton routes for CarTransaction (e.g., `/transactions`).
- Define skeleton routes for MakeModelYear (e.g., `/makemodelyear`).

fields.summary: Create README Documentation and Basic Project Details
fields.description:
Draft the initial README file with basic project details and setup instructions.

Subtasks:
- Create a comprehensive README file.
- Add basic project overview and objectives.
- Document installation and setup instructions.
- Outline planned API endpoints and features.
